AssessmentQuestion.name: AssessmentQuestion
AssessmentQuestion.description: Stores the questions required for an assessment.

ActiveVersionId.description: The ID of the active version of the assessment question.

DataType.description: Required. The data type of the assessment question.

Description.description: The description for the assessment question. This text is not rendered on the assessment.

DeveloperName.description: Required. The unique name of the object in the API. This name can contain only underscores and alphanumeric characters, and must be unique in your org. It must begin with a letter, not include spaces, not end with an underscore, and not contain two consecutive underscores. In managed packages, this field prevents naming conflicts on package installations.

DisplayTextCategory.description: Specifies the category of the display text when the data type is Text Block.

FormulaResponseDataType.description: Specifies the data type of the question response calculated by a formula.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: Required. The name of the record.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who created the relationship record.

QuestionText.description: Required. The label for the assessment question that appears on the assessment.

RelatedQuestionId.description: Identifies the ID of the related question. Used to define a question hierarchy.

ShouldExcludeFromMetadata.description: Indicates whether the assessment question record should be excluded from metadata (true) or not (false).

ShouldHideInDesigner.description: Indicates whether the assesment question record should be hidden in OmniScript designer (true) or not (false).

SourceSystemName.description: Specifies the source system name from where the content of the assessment question was retrieved.
